entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
